actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to revise retirement benefits for certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Indian Health Service not entitled to Indian preference, provide greater opportunity for advancement and employment of Indians, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides retirement benefits for employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Indian Health Service who have completed 20 years of service, served continuously from June 17, 1974, and are not entitled to Indian preference. Provides a formula based on length of service for computing the amount of such retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to revise retirement benefits for certain employees of the Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Indian Health Service not entitled to Indian preference, provide greater opportunity for advancement and employment of Indians, and for other purposes.
